articles.title: Rapid expansion, random wage cuts: behind the Wistron violence - The Indian Express
articles.description: Production at the plant at Narasapura in Kolar district around 60 km from Bengaluru, employing 1,343 regular workers and 8,490 contract workers, was suspended following the violence.
